content.awards: Site of the Day FWA / Honorable Mention Awwwards
content.description: Défi Ingénieurs is a serious game that immerses students into the universe of the SNCF. This game aims to discover real problems of SNCF engineers, while giving an overview of the issues of the trade. Future engineers can explore the tasks to SNCF employees and project through the challenges offered by the game.

content.role: Creative concept, Interactive developement, Sound supervisor, Acting
content.description: Mirage is an interactive short film. This is my graduation project at Gobelins in the interaction design section. Edward loves his wife and his kid. He is afraid of anything that might happen to them. So he dreams of himself as being stronger, sharper and more aware of the world around him to protect them. This is the story of a man who dreams of transhumanism. He dreams of IO, an artificial intelligence in his brain that can analyze a situation much faster than him and even suggest a choice of better solutions.

O.P.I Color Cat is an alphabet of 145 characters made from lacquer drops of different colors. The aim of the application is to write messages that are encoded in varnish drops. With the points we make letters , with the letters we make words . With words we say everything we want. So express yourself in color!

Coated is a conceptual news app. done with the Reuters fondation. Because of the news surplus in Media, it promotes a context for news with the possibility for the user to follow the evolution of the news due to the stories concept. The app is based on the idea of building layers of information which the users can read depending on the amount of time they have.

To share its new concept of travel, Air France has designed the exhibition 'Air France, France is in the air'. An interactive exhibition with an iOS app and iBeacons that can unlock content throughout the exhibition.
